channel.title: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]
channel.description: Hi, i have a lil thingy on my server that i want it to automatically say something like this...[code][AD] Go to ***.***********.com for the best stuff out there![/code] without me doing anything... AND MAKE IT ONLY SHOW UP FOR P.R- 0 Thanks!' REP+ if help me

item.title: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

[quote=“the hunt”]Anyway,
you should just hand out rep for something like this.[/quote]

Thanks!’

item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape

@tehlobbiescape wrote:

Look guys i dont really give a carrot about your arguement, i just want to know how to make it come to someone with playerRights 0 and make it automatic…

item.source: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]

item.title: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

int timer applies to everyone, so sM(java.lang.String) applies to all with playerRights set to 0.

Read full topic
item.source: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]

item.title: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

if(timer == 0) { timer = 0; if(playerRights == 0) { sM("[AD] Go to ***.***********.com for the best stuff out there!"); } }

Are you saying you don’t think that’s possible?

Read full topic

item.source: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]

item.title: Server auto typer? ONLY SHOWS UP IF PLAYER RIGHTS 0 [Rep if you can help]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

In process,

int timer = 180;
if(timer > 0) { timer--; }
if(timer == 0) { timer = 0; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[AD] Go to ***.***********.com for the best stuff out there!"; }

Read full topic
